Reviews.Title: Dome Cams great
Reviews.Author: Steven Blanton
Reviews.Content: These cameras have been doing a great job around my home wide view for what i am needing they are not the top end cameras you are getting the tvl and quaity you are paying for if you are looking for fine detail spend the money and buy more expensive but just to see who is coming and going these have been good for me.

ProductInfo.Features:
Waterproof Outdoor or Indoor Camera
520 TV lines ; 0 Lux minimum illumination ; Wide angle lens
Auto Gain Control (AGC): Build-in auto gain control (AGC) circuit. The color camera can get high definition picture in low Lux condition
Auto Electronic Shutter (AES): Built-in auto electronic shutter function. The color camera's AES speed can reach 1/100,000s
Gama Characteristic:0.45.
ProductInfo.Name: (4) Pack 520TVL, 1/3" Sony CCD Dome Waterproof Vandalproof Outdoor Indoor CCTV Surveillance Video Security Camera with Power Supply Kit - 26 IR LED, 3.6mm Wide Angle Lens
